name: Blackened Tofu Tacos with BBQ Onions
description: Blackened Tofu Tacos with Caramelized BBQ Onions are packed with delicious flavor and exciting textures! Gluten-free Nutfree
recipeIngredient: 14 ounces firm or extra firm tofu pressed for at least 15 minutes and cubed
1 teaspoon soy sauce or use tamari for gluten-free
1/2 teaspoon cayenne or chili powder blend
A good pinch of salt and pepper
2 cups of chopped lettuce or cabbage as needed
vegan ranch or vegan sour cream as needed

recipeInstructions.text: Press and cube the tofu if you haven't already. Then add to a bowl. Add the soy sauce and 1 teaspoon oil and toss well to coat.
recipeInstructions.name: Press and cube the tofu if you haven't already. Then add to a bowl. Add the soy sauce and 1 teaspoon oil and toss well to coat.

recipeInstructions.text: In another small shallow bowl, mix all the spices then sprinkle the spices over the tofu and toss well to coat.
recipeInstructions.name: In another small shallow bowl, mix all the spices then sprinkle the spices over the tofu and toss well to coat.

recipeInstructions.text: Heat a large skillet over medium-high heat.Add 2 teaspoons of oil and let the oil heat up then add in your spiced tofu.
recipeInstructions.name: Heat a large skillet over medium-high heat.Add 2 teaspoons of oil and let the oil heat up then add in your spiced tofu.

recipeInstructions.text: Cook for 7-10 minutes or until the tofu is golden, is crispy on most of the edges.
recipeInstructions.name: Cook for 7-10 minutes or until the tofu is golden, is crispy on most of the edges.

recipeInstructions.text: You might want to be careful with the end of cooking so as to not burn the spices.
recipeInstructions.name: You might want to be careful with the end of cooking so as to not burn the spices.

recipeInstructions.text: Make the BBQ onions: Heat the oil in a medium skillet over medium heat. Add the onion and a pinch of salt and pepper and cook until the onion is golden. 7-8 mins. Stir occasionally.
recipeInstructions.name: Make the BBQ onions: Heat the oil in a medium skillet over medium heat. Add the onion and a pinch of salt and pepper and cook until the onion is golden. 7-8 mins. Stir occasionally.

recipeInstructions.text: Then add in your BBQ sauce and hot sauce and toss well to coat then take off heat.
recipeInstructions.name: Then add in your BBQ sauce and hot sauce and toss well to coat then take off heat.

recipeInstructions.text: To assemble tacos, warm your tortillas on a gas stove or a pan then layer a layer of lettuce. Add a good helping of the tofu.
recipeInstructions.name: To assemble tacos, warm your tortillas on a gas stove or a pan then layer a layer of lettuce. Add a good helping of the tofu.

recipeInstructions.text: Squeeze some lime juice over the tofu then top it with the BBQ onions, more lettuce, and vegan ranch, or sour cream as needed.
recipeInstructions.name: Squeeze some lime juice over the tofu then top it with the BBQ onions, more lettuce, and vegan ranch, or sour cream as needed.

recipeInstructions.text: Repeat for all your tacos and serve immediately.
recipeInstructions.name: Repeat for all your tacos and serve immediately.
